parts.text: {"word":"high-level","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"高水準の、高度な、高級な","english_definition":"of or relating to a high rank, quality, or degree; advanced; sophisticated.","examples":[{"sentence":"a high-level meeting","translation":"幹部会議、高官会議"},{"sentence":"high-level skills","translation":"高度なスキル"},{"sentence":"high-level waste","translation":"高レベル廃棄物"},{"sentence":"a high-level overview","translation":"概要、大まかな説明"}],"collocations":["high-level executive","high-level official","high-level language","high-level design","high-level security","high-level talks","high-level discussion","high-level synthesis"],"synonyms":["advanced","sophisticated","top-level","senior","elite","complex"],"antonyms":["low-level","basic","entry-level","simple"]},{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"(プログラミング) 人間が理解しやすい、抽象度の高い","english_definition":"(of a programming language) resembling human language; abstract and easy to use.","examples":[{"sentence":"Python is a high-level language.","translation":"Pythonは高水準言語です。"},{"sentence":"High-level languages are easier to learn than low-level languages.","translation":"高水準言語は低水準言語よりも習得しやすいです。"}],"collocations":["high-level programming language","high-level API","high-level code","high-level abstraction"],"synonyms":["abstract","user-friendly","portable"],"antonyms":["low-level","machine-level","hardware-dependent"]}],"etymology":{"value":"'High' (高い) と 'level' (水準) の複合語。文字通りには「高い水準」を意味し、抽象的な意味合いとして、技能、階級、抽象度などが高いことを示す。","priority":"★★★"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˌhaɪ ˈlevəl/","syllables":"high-lev-el"},"inflection":{"notes":"形容詞のため、活用変化はありません。"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**high-level**」は、文字通り「高い水準」を意味し、文脈によって様々な意味合いを持ちます。ビジネスや政治の文脈では「幹部」「高官」といった高い地位や階級を表し、技術的な文脈では「高度な」「複雑な」といった意味になります。プログラミングの分野では、人間が理解しやすい抽象度の高い言語を指します。反対語は「low-level」です。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ He has very high level in English.","correct":"✓ He has a very high level of English.","note":"「英語のレベルが高い」と言う場合は、"a high level of English" のように "of" を使う必要があります。"},{"incorrect":"✗ This is a high level difficult problem.","correct":"✓ This is a high-level, difficult problem.","note":"形容詞を重ねる場合は、コンマで区切るか、ハイフンで繋いで複合形容詞にします。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["high-level language (高水準言語)","high-level design (高レベル設計)","high-level executive (高レベル幹部)"],"idioms_phrases":[],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的高頻度 (Relatively high frequency)","priority":"★★☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"「**high-level**」は、何かがある程度進んでいるか、重要であることを示す形容詞です。ビジネスでは、上級管理職や重要な会議を指すことがあります。技術的な文脈では、複雑で高度なシステムやスキルを指します。プログラミングでは、人間が読み書きしやすい言語を指します。この単語は、文脈によって意味が異なるため、注意が必要です。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The company held a **high-level** meeting to discuss the new strategy.","translation":"会社は新しい戦略について議論するために幹部会議を開催した。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"高水準の（会議）"},{"sentence":"She has **high-level** programming skills.","translation":"彼女は高度なプログラミングスキルを持っている。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"高度な（スキル）"},{"sentence":"Python is a **high-level** programming language.","translation":"Pythonは高水準プログラミング言語です。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"高水準の（プログラミング言語）"},{"sentence":"The report provides a **high-level** overview of the project.","translation":"その報告書はプロジェクトの概要を提供している。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"概要"}]}
